mapper.select: SELECT POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, WDATE FROM SH_POLL ORDER BY POLLID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SH_POLL (POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, WDATE) VALUES (SH_POLL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{question}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{itemcount}, 0, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SH_POLLSUB(POLLSUBID, POLLID, ANSWER, ACOUNT) VALUES(SH_POLLSUB_SEQ.NEXTVAL,(SELECT NVL(MAX(POLLID), 0) FROM SH_POLL), #{answer}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, WDATE FROM SH_POLL WHERE POLLID=#{pollid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SH_VOTER(VOTERID, POLLID, POLLSUBID, ID, WDATE) VALUES(SH_VOTER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pollid}, #{pollsubid}, #{id}, SYSDATE)
